name: Autumn Fruits Arrangement
description:
Info

You're a farmer and have to pack you autumn fruits. But you want to fill the crate with all your fruits and that's quite hard. Can you do it ? Try and let me know !

It's a puzzle game I made for Autumn game Jam.

Controls

Left Click to Drag and Drop.

Right Click to Rotate View.

Fill the crate with you fruit to win.

The game has 5 levels now, will add more soon.
